A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It honestly feels like Rian Johnson (the director) and the team of writers simply didn't watch or didn't care about Star War TFA.\n50% of the jokes fell flat\, plot points that were set up in the previous movie were thrown out the window or completely butchered. A Subplot that was a complete waste of time. And other \"spoilery\" problems that I won't mention.\nBut hey at least the visuals were great.
